column5: Babble: Similar to Telepathic Communication but can have several participants but has the disadvantage of being heard as outside stimuli can interfere.
column6: Description
Open your mind to the thoughts and emotions of a crowd

Know what someone wants to hear in order to get the best reaction

Socially outwit someone by knowing what they are going to say ahead of time

Create a connection to something so you can find its geographical location
Mentally speak with someone

Continuously read someone's thoughts to know what they are thinking and about to do
Take other people with you to travel astrally
The pain from wounds makes you act stronger
View someone's aura
See the truths behind reality in metaphor

Take on fictitious personalities as your own

The vampire can add their Auspex rating to their perception checks.

column6: The vampire can gather information from an entire city-block at once.
Amalgam of Dominate 3. The vampire can take over the body of a mortal.
The vampire can project their thoughts into the mind of another kindred or mortal or read surface level thoughts and emotions.
Shares the vampire's own sense of moral peace of mind with another Kindred willing to repent of their sins. Amalgam: Dominate 3. Requires  Obeah.
